downloadTitle: Teams for Education getting started resources
downloadDescription: Get started quickly with Teams for Education using this PDF resource guide for IT professionals and admins.
detailsSection: Get started quickly with Teams for Education using this PDF resource guide with resources for IT professionals and admins, faculty, and students. Resources include links to tutorials, demos, quick start guides, technical documentation, and Teams for Education adoption resources.
installInstructionSection:
1. Select the Download button to start the download.
  2. The download should start automatically. If prompted, select Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Select Open file or find the file on your device and open it.
